tags.name: Payees API
tags.description:
Obtain a list of pre-registered payees authorised to be shared by the customer. Payees API is a consumer API. To access data you'll need the customer's consent.

Host URL

All requests are passed to the URL https://secure.api.commbank.com.au/api/cds-au/v1/banking

get.description: Obtain a list of pre-registered payees

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Filter on the payee type field.

get.description:
Obtain detailed information on a single payee.

Note that the payee sub-structure should be selected to represent the payment destination only rather than any known characteristics of the payment recipient

parameters.name: payeeId
parameters.description: The ID used to locate the details of a particular payee

x-v.description: Version of the API end point responded with.

x-fapi-interaction-id.description: Reflects the value of the Interaction ID in the request.

nickname.description: The short display name of the payee as provided by the customer.

description.description: A description of the payee provided by the customer.

creationDate.description: The date the payee was created by the customer.

payeeUType.description: Type of object included that describes the payee in detail

accountName.description: Name of the account to pay to.

bsb.description: BSB of the account to pay to.

accountNumber.description: Number of the account to pay to.

cardNumber.description: Name of the account to pay to.

name.description: The name assigned to the PayID by the owner of the PayID.

identifier.description: The identifier of the PayID (dependent on type).

billerCode.description: BPAY Biller Code of the Biller.

fedWireNumber.description: Number for Fedwire payment (Federal Reserve Wire Network).

sortCode.description: Sort code used for account identification in some jurisdictions.

chipNumber.description: Number for the Clearing House Interbank Payments System.

legalEntityIdentifier.description: The legal entity identifier (LEI) for the beneficiary.

self.description: Fully qualified link that generated the current response document.
Fully qualified link that generated the current response document.

first.description: URI to the first page of this set.

prev.description: URI to the previous page of this set.

next.description: URI to the next page of this set.

last.description: URI to the last page of this set.

totalRecords.description: The total number of records in the full set.

totalPages.description: The total number of pages in the full set.

errors.title: page is invalid
errors.detail: page must be a valid number.

errors.title: Payee not found.
errors.detail: No payee was found with that id.

errors.title: x-v is invalid
errors.detail: x-v header must be a supported version number.

errors.Title: page-size is Invalid
errors.Detail: page-size must be a number and between 1 and 1000.

errors.title: Server Error
errors.detail: An error has occurred whilst processing your request. Please try again later.

ParamXFapiInterationId.name: x-fapi-interaction-id
ParamXFapiInterationId.description: Reflects the value of the Interaction ID in the request.

ParamXFapiAuthDate.name: x-fapi-auth-date
ParamXFapiAuthDate.description: The time when the customer last logged in to the data recipient.

ParamXFapiCustomerIpAddress.name: x-fapi-customer-ip-address
ParamXFapiCustomerIpAddress.description: The customer's original IP address if the customer is currently logged in to the data recipient.

ParamXCdsClientHeaders.name: x-cds-client-headers
ParamXCdsClientHeaders.description: The customer's original standard http headers encoded, including the original User Agent header, if the customer is currently logged in to the data recipient.

ParamPageSize.name: page-size
ParamPageSize.description: Number of records to return with the page

ParamAcceptHeader.name: Accept
ParamAcceptHeader.description: Content-Type that is acceptable for the server's response.

ParamXVHeader.name: x-v
ParamXVHeader.description: Version of the API end point being requested.

ParamXMinVHeader.name: x-min-v
ParamXMinVHeader.description: Minimum version of the API end point you are requesting.
